    		Technology & Learning Program
    	TLP Virtual Services TLP Live Zoom Virtual Support(opens in new window)   Hours:   Monday - Friday, 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.        By Email: tlp@csuchico.eduCanvas After Hours Support (24/7)Available by phone (530)-230-0546 or chat via the Canvas Help MenuBlackboard After Hours Support: Call ITSS at 530-898-HELP after 5 p.m. Their voicemail will direct you to Blackboard after-hours support. 
                        Canvas News & Communications
                    Current EntriesIntroducing Canvas 10-Minute TasksTLP is excited to introduce our Canvas 10-minute tasks because we know you are busy. Learn the basics: 5 days x 10 minutes per day = 1st day of class readyLater you can go deeper by adding the next layer of course content.  Check out all Canvas communications here...
                        Request a Consultation
                    Fill out this form to request a personal consultation with one of our Instructional Technology Consultants. 
                        Request Help with Accessibility 
                    Request help from TLP to check your course materials for accessibility issues, fix the issues, and circle back with you to upload the remediated documents back into your course. Academic Technology Services Data: Here to Support YouTechnology & Learning Program Ticket Analytics (Google Slide) (Google Slide)Learning Management System (LMS) Analytics (Google Slide) (Google Slide)Provost & Vice President for Academic AffairsKendall Hall, Room 106530-898-6101academicaffairs@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/vpaaDivision of Academic AffairsAcademic ProgramsAcademic SenateBudget & Academic ResourcesChico State EnterprisesColleges at Chico StateMeriam LibraryOffice of Academic PersonnelProfessional & Continuing Education
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
